Updated November     pm



Aidan Kirkbride scored his second goal of the season and the eighth of his career against the Gamecocks Friday night PERIOD Photo by Chris Crews PERIOD

The Charlotte 49ers mens soccer team   host to the  Conference USA Mens Soccer Championships at Transamerica Field have earned the sixth seed after recording four shutouts in the last five games PERIOD

For much of the regular season Niner Nation was left wondering if the 49ers would make the tournament PERIOD Charlotte has won five straight games and in those five the 49ers have outscored opponents  PERIOD

In the first round of the conference tournament the fourthseeded South Carolina   will face off with the fifthseeded Tulsa   at  p.m PERIOD on Wednesday Nov PERIOD  PERIOD

The secondseeded Old Dominion   will play the seventhseeded Kentucky   following the South CarolinaTulsa game at  p.m PERIOD

The 49ers will make their tournament debut on Wednesday night at  p.m PERIOD against the thirdseeded UAB   PERIOD Charlotte tied UAB on the road in a  draw earlier this season in double overtime PERIOD In the  times that the two teams have met over the years Charlotte holds a  record PERIOD

New Mexico   earned the top seed and a firstround bye in the tournament PERIOD New Mexico will play the winner of the South CarolinaTulsa match in the semifinals of the tournament on Friday Nov PERIOD  at  p.m PERIOD

The winner of the Old DominionKentucky game will face the winner of the CharlotteUAB match in the semifinals at  p.m PERIOD

The championship game will be played on Sunday Nov PERIOD  at  p.m PERIOD and will be broadcasted live on the CBS Sports Network PERIOD

UNC Charlotte students can use their valid student ID to gain admission to any of the tournament games for free PERIOD
